title: The Other olympians
creator_credit: Andrew Wiseman, Ian Lang and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A documentary which examines the training procedures of two paraplegic athletes preparing for the Olympics for the Disabled staged in the Netherlands in 1980. Also covers the rehabilitation period of a young man who has only recently been left paralysed as the result of an accident. Narrated by Phillip Adams.
creator_credit_for_label: Andrew Wiseman, Ian Lang and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
